TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CultureInfoConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供将 对象与其他各种表示形式相互转换的类型转换器。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert objects to and from various other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此转换器只能将对象转换 为字符串和从字符串转换。This converter can only convert a object to and from a string. 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅 基类和 [如何：实现类型转换器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120))。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120)). > [!NOTE] > 永远不应创建类的实例 。You should never create an instance of the class. 而应调用 类的 方法。Instead, call the method of the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅基类中的示例 。For more information, see the examples in the base class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将类型的变量转换 为字符串，反之亦然。The following code example converts a variable of type to a string, and vice versa. 首先，它 使用由 "el" ) 表示的希腊语区域性构造变量，并将其转换为字符串 "希腊语" (。First it constructs a variable using the Greek culture (represented by "el") and converts it to the string "Greek". 然后，它将字符串 "俄语" 转换为 表示形式 "ru"。Then it converts the string "Russian" to the representation "ru". [!code-cpp[Converters#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CPP/converters.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[Converters#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/CS/converters.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Converters#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Converters/VB/converters.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此转换器只能将对象转换 为字符串和从字符串转换。This converter can only convert a object to and from a string. `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为 `null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象的属性可以返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为 `null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象的属性可以返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the list of standard values returned from is an exhaustive list.

returns.span: 返回 ，因为从 返回的 不是可能的值的穷举列表（换言之，其他值也是可能的）。

span.span: because the returned from is not an exhaustive list of possible values (that is, other values are possible).
This method never returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 此参数可能为 `null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象的属性可以返回 `null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`. 如果列表不完整，则除了提供的标准值列表之外还有其他有效值 。When the list is not exhaustive, then there are other valid values besides the list of standard values that provides.
